name: Honey Bee All Natural Lip Balm
description:
Honey Bee
Handmade Lip Balm 
100% Natural 
.75 oz

Our decadent lip balms are made with cocoa and shea butter, natural oils, beeswax, vitamin E (an antioxidant) and natural flavor/fragrance oils. They glide on smooth and instantly moisturize the lips. They do not feel waxy or greasy, just smooth and buttery. No sweeteners are added, and the balms remain a natural ivory color. Our lip balms are 100% natural and safe for the lips, even for children.

This balm smells like sweet honey and beeswax.

Directions: Using finger, rub on balm to soften and rub finger on lips to apply.

Ingredients: Prunus Dulcis (Almond) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Natural Fragrance Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E).

Each ingredient is one or more of the following: 
Organic * Sustainable * Fairly Traded * Wild Crafted

name: Wild Irish Rose Milk and Honey Body Lotion
description:
Wild Irish Rose
Milk & Honey
Body Lotion 
8 oz

The classic, rich floral scent of roses is unmistakable in this lovely body lotion.  Luxurious lotion made with goat's milk, shea butter, and honey, lightly scented with essential oils, leaving your skin silky and smooth.  Created in small batches, color and texture may vary.

Directions: Apply a small amount to skin.  Allow to absorb.

Warnings:  For external use only.  Avoid contact with eyes.  If irritation occurs, discontinue use.  Keep out of reach of small children.

Water, Glyceryl Stearate, Isopropyl Myristate, Caprylic/Capric Glyceride, Stearic Acid, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth 20, Soybean Oil, Shea Butter, Dimethicone, Sunflower Oil, Aloe Barbadensis, Goat Milk Extract, Hydroxypropyl Trimonium Honey, Benzophenone, Methylparaben, Propylparabaen, DMDM Hydantoin, Triethanolamine Disodium EDTA, Natural Fragrance.

Most ingredients are one or more of the following: 
Organic * Sustainable * Fairly Traded * Wild Crafted

name: LARGE Lemon Lavender Bath Bomb All Natural with Essential Oils
description:
Lemon Lavender 
Bath Bomb
100% Natural
7.5 oz

A classic floral scent with a twist of lemon sprinkled with organic lavender buds. Each bomb contains natural ingredients scented with essential oils, which fizz for up to 3 minutes in water as the skin softening ingredients are released in the tub. Each package contains 1 extra large bomb, about 3 inches in diameter, packaged in cellophane with a black satin ribbon. Colors, shapes and textures may vary. 

Directions: Fill tub with warm water. After entering tub drop one bomb or tablet into tub. Bomb will fizz and melt. Soak for 20 minutes.

Warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of small children.

Ingredients: Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Lavandula Augustifolia (Lavender), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Lavandula Officinalis (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Oil, Ultramarine, Iron Oxide, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel).

Most ingredients are one or more of the following: 
Organic * Sustainable * Fairly Traded * Wild Crafted

Testimonials:

"These are absolutely wonderful products, and I'm so glad that I ordered them!" 

"Relaxing scent, beautiful packaging, very pleased!"

name: Rosemary Lemongrass Aromatherapy Bath Salts With Dried Lemongrass
description:
Rosemary Lemongrass
Bath Salts 
100% Natural 
8 oz

These fresh and invigorating bath salts possess a refreshing herbal scent with notes of lemongrass and rosemary. This scent is good for both men and women. Colored in true blue with dried lemongrass. Comes with a muslin bag.

Dead Sea salts, known for their therapeutic benefits for skin, are combined with essential oils and natural herbs and botanicals to treat your body with a mineral rich bath. Created in small batches, colors and textures may vary, giving you a one of a kind bathing experience.

Directions: Fill tub with warm water. After entering tub, pour 1/4 to 1/2 cup salts into tub. If botanicals are not desired, place salts in muslin bag and then place in tub to dissolve. Soak for 20 minutes. Empty and rinse tub.

Sea Salt, Sodium Chloride, Cymbopogon Citratus (Lemongrass), Glycerin, Natural Fragrance, Ultramarine. 

Each ingredient is one or more of the following: 
Organic * Sustainable * Fairly Traded * Wild Crafted

name: French Lavender Aromatherapy Bath Milk
description:
French Lavender
Bath Milk 
100% Natural 
8 oz

This scent makes you feel like you are standing in a field of lavender on the French countryside.

Creamy goat's milk, soothing oats, and cleansing honey, create a delicate, skin softening milk bath. Handcrafted with natural ingredients, botanicals and essential oils. Colors and textures may vary.

Directions: Fill tub with warm water. Add 1/4 cup milk to tub. Mix to dissolve. Soak in tub for 20 minutes.

Goat Milk, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Mel (Honey) Powder, Maltodextrin, Sodium Chloride, Natural Fragrance.

Each ingredient is one or more of the following: 
Organic * Sustainable * Fairly Traded * Wild Crafted

name: Mens Shaving Set - Bay Rum
description:
Will ship Nov. 1st

Bay Rum- Shaving Gift Set
Includes:

The perfect gift for the men in your life. This 100% natural goat's milk and shea butter shaving soap AND bath soap is made with dark Jamaican Rum and scented in a Bay Rum all natural scent (bay, cloves, and orange). The bath soap leaves you clean. The shaving soap provides a smooth, slick soapy layer, perfect for shaving. It will leave your skin soft and clean. 

The set contains 1 round bar of shaving soap made with kaolin clay, 1 bar bath soap, 1 light wood shaving dish with drain holes, and 1 quality shaving brush (NOTE: Our new brush is larger, fuller, better quality, with a cream colored handle). The set is packaged in a lovely black and white box with clear lid, satin ribbon, and white crinkle paper. The box is all one piece and can be reused. 

To prevent damage during shipping, the gift set will be filled with packing peanuts that will need to be removed before giving the gift to that special someone. This will ensure that the items in the box are not jostled around in transit. 

Handcrafted, natural Goatâ€™s Milk soaps enriched with Shea butter. Created in small batches, each soap is unique. Colors, textures, & shapes may vary, giving you a one of a kind bathing experience.

Directions: Wet soap. Rub on area to be shaved or use wet brush to apply shaving soap. For best results, allow soap to completely dry after each use before placing it back in the wood container. Rinse brush well and allow to dry in upright position. 

Warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of small children. Be careful when shaving, as this soap provides a very slick coating on the skin.

Ingredients: Goat Milk, Heliathanus Annus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Prunus Dulcis (Almond) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Water, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Kaolin Clay, Natural Fragrance Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxide. 

Most ingredients are one or more of the following: 
Organic * Sustainable * Fairly Traded * Wild Crafted

name: Gingerbread Soy Candle in 6oz Tin
description:
Gingerbread
Handmade Soy Candle
Natural 
6 oz

A gingerbread spice scent for the holidays smells absolutely delicious. This scent is especially enjoyed by teens, the young at heart, and gingerbread lovers.

Packaged in a 6 oz tin with lid and designed to coordinate with our bath and body products.  Handcrafted with natural soy wax and fragrance.  Colors, textures, & shapes may vary.

Directions: Handle with care. Do not allow the flame to touch the side of the container. The container may become hot. If smoking occurs, check for drafts or high traffic areas, which may cause flame to flicker and smoke. Also, be sure that the wick is no longer than 1/4". If it is, extinguish, trim to 1/4", and relight. To minimize wax left on the sides of the container, burn 2.5 hours at a time; it is normal for some wax to be left. The amount will vary per color, fragrance and burning conditions. Prevent possible heat damage to the counter/surface by discontinuing use when 1/2" of wax remains. Only burn in a suitable holder, or on a plate or other fire and heat resistant surface. Extinguish carefully before replacing the lid.

Directions: Handle with care. Do not allow the flame to touch the side of the container. The container may become hot. Never leave a burning candle unattended.

description:

A fresh pine forest scent for the holidays, this candle smells absolutely divine.  It is colored a soft green and is perfect for the kitchen.  

Packaged in a 6 oz tin with lid and designed to coordinate with our bath and body products.  Handcrafted with natural soy wax and fragrance.  Colors, textures, & shapes may vary.

Directions: Handle with care. Do not allow the flame to touch the side of the container. The container may become hot. If smoking occurs, check for drafts or high traffic areas, which may cause flame to flicker and smoke. Also, be sure that the wick is no longer than 1/4". If it is, extinguish, trim to 1/4", and relight. To minimize wax left on the sides of the container, burn 2.5 hours at a time; it is normal for some wax to be left. The amount will vary per color, fragrance and burning conditions. Prevent possible heat damage to the counter/surface by discontinuing use when 1/2" of wax remains. Only burn in a suitable holder, or on a plate or other fire and heat resistant surface. Extinguish carefully before replacing the lid.
